column5: Interesting obituary for a good Canadian author from today's NY Timeshttps://www.nytimes.com/2017/03/20/b...iter.html?_r=0

Wow, what an interesting read. The man lived and contributed, in spite of the odds against. So many lives are made up not just of mostly positives or negatives, but a combination of each, each vying to overcome the other. R.I.P. Bill
